Package gameClient

Class Ex2

java.lang.Object
gameClient.Ex2
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.lang.Runnable
public class Ex2
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Runnable
This class is an executable main that runs the pokemon game.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor Description
    Ex2()  

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    static void chooseNextNode​(MyAgent a, game_service game)
    This method sets a new destination node to the received agent.
    static void chooseNextPoke​(MyAgent agent)
    This method chooses the closest pokemon (which is not being chases by any other agent) to the received agent.
    static void chooseNextPokeMax​(MyAgent a)
    This method chooses the pokemon with the highest value (which is not being chases by any other agent) to the received agent.
    static void gottaCatchHim​(MyPokemon p, MyAgent a, dw_graph_algorithms ga)
    This method receives a pokemon and an agent and sets their parameters so that the agent will chase the pokemon.
    static void init​(game_service game, dw_graph_algorithms graph_algo)
    This method initializes this class objects according to the game graph and info, this method is called iff the graph of the game is strongly connected.
    static MyAgent isAgentStuck​(game_service game)
    This method returns an agent that is stuck on it's destination node and has no new destination.
    static void main​(java.lang.String[] args)  
    static void moveAllAgents​(game_service game)
    This method sets the next destination nodes to all the agents that are currently not moving.
    static void multiInit​(game_service game, dw_graph_algorithms graph_algo, java.util.List<java.util.List<node_data>> Components)
    This method initializes this class objects according to the game graph and info, this method is called iff the graph of the game is not strongly connected.
    static int numOfAgents​(game_service game)
    This method returns the number of agents which should be added in order to start the game.
    static MyAgent readyToCatch​(java.util.List<MyAgent> list)
    This method return an agent that is on the source node of the edge of the pokemon he's chasing.
    void run()  
    static void sortMegaList​(java.util.List<java.util.List<node_data>> Components)
    This method sorts list of lists according to the number of nodes contained in each list, the sort is in a descending order.
    static void sortPoke​(MyPokemon[] arr)
    This method sorts the received MyPokemon array - arr, according to the pokemon values in a descending order.
    static void swap​(int i, int j, MyPokemon[] arr)
    This method swaps the i and j index in the received MyPokemon array - arr.
    static long timeFromPokemon​(directed_weighted_graph g, geo_location p_pos, edge_data p_edge, double speed)
    This method receives a pokemon and an agent and return the needed time for the agent to reach the pokemon.

    Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

    clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait
